rows.label: qst003503_msg0001
rows.name:
A Morph Orb!
This is just like my da's.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0002
rows.name:
Thanks a million! You're a right good
bunch of Drivers and Blades!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0003
rows.name:
Hey, Kallum! I got a Morph Orb.
Same as the other one!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0004
rows.name: It really is just like it...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0005
rows.name:
Hmph. All right, I guess you can
have the other one back then.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0006
rows.name:
But if I see your dad "salvaging"
round our Superbian base again...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0007
rows.name:
I'll tell my dad we've got a spy sniffing
round!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0008
rows.name: ...You needn't worry on that score...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0009
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0010
rows.name:
My da's dead.
Thanks to those Superbian
army recruiters...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0011
rows.name:
Hey, Kallum... You said that
Morph Orb was yours 'cos it came
from the Superbian base, right?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0012
rows.name:
Then what about my da?
It's Superbia's fault he's dead...
Does that make it your-

rows.label: qst003503_msg0013
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]W-what?!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0014
rows.name: I-I didn't... I wouldn't...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0015
rows.name:
Us Gulan and you Superbians...
We're always at each other's throats.
It never seems to stop.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0016
rows.name:
Sooner or later it's going to
turn to violence...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0017
rows.name: Violence? You don't mean...w-war?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0018
rows.name:
Your dad's pretty important
in Superbia, right?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0019
rows.name:
Then maybe you can do something to
prevent that from happening!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0020
rows.name:
I-I don't think there's anything I can do.
My dad isn't that great really...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0021
rows.name: What? You think you can help?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0022
rows.name:
Yeah, look! These people come from
all sorts of different places! And you
don't see them fighting each other!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0023
rows.name: If they can do it, surely we can too...

rows.label: qst003503_msg0024
rows.name:
Hmph! Well, when I become rich
and famous, I'm gonna stop all war
for good!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0025
rows.name: Pain and suffering is stupid anyway!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0026
rows.name:
Thanks again for your kind help! 
You've taught us a lesson.

rows.label: qst003503_msg0027
rows.name:
Hey, Kallum! How about you teach me
some Superbian games!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0028
rows.name:
I heard everyone plays this game called
Chooby Tubes in Superbia, right?

rows.label: qst003503_msg0029
rows.name:
Sure, I'll teach you to play
Chooby Tubes. It's my favorite game!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0030
rows.name:
But you'd better treat me to one
of those Lunana Smoothies in return!

rows.label: qst003503_msg0031
rows.name: Sure! C'mon, let's go get some!
